instruction: Create a response for a customer who has an issue with the product delivery.
input: A customer has emailed to report he has been waiting for 5 days and still has not received his product.
output: I sincerely apologize for the delay in your product delivery and the inconvenience it has caused you. We are currently investigating your issue and we will contact you as soon as possible with an update. In the meantime, please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.
